relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, no acute distress.
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmurs/gallops/rubs.
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes/rhonchi/rales.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft and distended, minimal tenderness to palpation over umbilicus, no rebound or guarding, normoactive bowel sounds, no palpable masses. Large right inguinal hernia, sliding, easily reducible and nontender.
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused.
